title: 'Prepare, Don't Predict' as the Federal Reserve Continues to Hike Rates

media:group.media:title: 'Prepare, Don't Predict' as the Federal Reserve Continues to Hike Rates
media:group.media:description:
With the Federal Reserve's recent rate hike and continued market volatility, most investors will remain bearish. However, Matt is still bullish on stocks. So on this episode of Making Money With Matt McCall, Matt sits down with someone known for his bearish stance. His good friend and colleague Dan Ferris comes to chat about everything from the housing market... to cryptos... to gold.

Many folks at the annual Stansberry conference thought Dan and Matt were complete opposites... a bull versus a bear. But they do agree on one thing wholeheartedly... As they discuss, "There's always something to buy... You might have to look hard, but there's always something to buy." And there are certainly opportunities out there right now...

#federalreserve #gold #stockmarket 

00:00 Dan Ferris Introduction
1:52 Housing Market Forecast
5:33 Bitcoin Opportunities and Dan's Newsletter 
9:14 Pitch for Gold and Other Metals
14:58 Dan's Overall Views 
18:45 Bull Vs. Bear Debate
21:14 Investment to Own for Next 10-Years
